    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox20804139">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20804139">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20804139">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content20804139">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>
           <br />
           <br />
           <a href="mailto:kcannon@muhlenberg.edu">
            Kelly Cannon
           </a>
           <br />
           Outreach and Scholarly
           <br />
           Communication Librarian,
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business
           <br />
           Subject Specialist
           <br />
           <br />
           phone: 484-664-3602
           <br />
           email:
           <a href="mailto:kcannon@muhlenberg.edu">
            kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           </a>
           <br />
           <br />
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt20804139" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox20804140">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20804140">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20804140">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20804140">
          <div id="boxatt20804140" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24264498">
              <a id="link_24264498" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://site.ebrary.com/lib/muhlenberg/Top?id=10308872" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24264498,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'LGBTQ Resources', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24264498}); ">
               The dictionary of homophobia : a global history of gay &amp; lesbian experience
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Based on the work of seventy researchers in fifteen countries, The Dictionary of Homophobia is a mammoth, encyclopedic book that documents the history of homosexuality, and various cultural responses to it, in all regions of the world: a masterful, engaged, and wholly relevant study that traces the political and social emancipation of a culture. The book, which includes Canadian contributors and issues, is the first English translation of Dictionnaire de L'Homophobie, published in France in 2003 to world-wide acclaim. The Dictionary includes over 175 essays on various aspects of gay rights and.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24264493">
              <a id="link_24264493" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://muhlenberg.eblib.com/patron/FullRecord.aspx?p=329139" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24264493,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'LGBTQ Resources', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24264493}); ">
               Encyclopedia of gay and lesbian popular culture
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               During the 20th century through today, gay and lesbian artists, writers, political activists, and sports figures contributed their talents to all areas of popular culture. Authors such as E. Lynn Harris and Patricia Highsmith write bestselling novels. Rupert Everett follows in the footsteps of Rock Hudson and others who starred in multimillion dollar films. George Michael and k.d.lang have been the creative forces behind dozens of hit songs, and the TV programs of Ellen DeGeneres, Rosie O'Donnell, and the cast of Queer Eye for the Straight Guy are enjoyed in gay and straight households alike.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24264510">
              <a id="link_24264510" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://site.ebrary.com/lib/muhlenberg/Top?id=10096942" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24264510,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'LGBTQ Resources', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24264510}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Lesbian and Gay Histories and Cultures
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The Encyclopedia of Lesbian and Gay Histories and Cultures in two volumes attempts to open up for contemporary readers the complex history and wide cultural diversity of lesbian and gay life.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24264501">
              <a id="link_24264501" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/0PFR" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24264501,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'LGBTQ Resources', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24264501}); ">
               Encyclopedia of lesbian, gay, bisexual, and transgender history in America
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Online version of the 3-vol. work published by Gale providing a comprehensive survey of lesbian and gay history and culture in the United States.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20804141">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20804141">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20804141">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Selected books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20804141">
          <div id="boxatt20804141" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24264628">
              <a id="link_24264628" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/stable/10.2307/j.ctt9qfr26" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24264628,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'LGBTQ Resources', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24264628}); ">
               Gay dads : transitions to adoptive fatherhood
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               When gay couples become parents, they face a host of questions and issues that their straight counterparts may never have to consider. How important is it for each partner to have a biological tie to their child? How will they become parents: will they pursue surrogacy, or will they adopt? Will both partners legally be able to adopt their child? Will they have to hide their relationship to speed up the adoption process? Will one partner be the primary breadwinner? And how will their lives change, now that the presence of a child has made their relationship visible to the rest of the world?
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24264618">
              <a id="link_24264618" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://site.ebrary.com/lib/muhlenberg/Top?id=10488615" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24264618,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'LGBTQ Resources', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24264618}); ">
               The health of lesbian, gay, bisexual, and transgender people : building a foundation for better understanding
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The report examines the health status of LGBT populations in three life stages: childhood and adolescence, early/middle adulthood, and later adulthood.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24264624">
              <a id="link_24264624" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://site.ebrary.com/lib/muhlenberg/Top?id=10649886" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24264624,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'LGBTQ Resources', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24264624}); ">
               Homosexuality in art
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               This book is not a panegyric of homosexuality. It is a scientific study led by Professor James Smalls who teaches art history at the prestigious University of Maryland, Baltimore. Abandoning all classical clicheÃÅs and sociological approaches, the author highlights the sensibility particular to homosexuals. This book examines the process of creation and allows one to comprehend the contribution of homosexuality to the evolution of emotional perception. In a time when all barriers have been overcome, this analysis offers a new understanding of our civilisation's masterpieces.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24264606">
              <a id="link_24264606" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/stable/10.2307/j.ctt9qfwcb" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24264606,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'LGBTQ Resources', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24264606}); ">
               Living out Islam : voices of gay, lesbian, and transgender Muslims
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Living Out Islam documents the rarely-heard voices of Muslims who live in secular democratic countries and who are gay, lesbian, and transgender.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20804142">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20804142">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20804142">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Journals
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20804142">
          <div id="boxatt20804142" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24264528">
              <a id="link_24264528" href="http://link.worldcat.org/?rft.institution_id=2547&amp;pkgName=aph&amp;rft.oclcnum=2256995&amp;issn=0001-8996&amp;linkclass=to_article&amp;jKey=AVT&amp;provider=EBSCOhost&amp;title=Advocate&amp;rft.content=fulltext&amp;linkScheme=ebscoh&amp;jHome=http%3A%2F%2Fsearch.ebscohost.com%2Fdirect.asp%3Fdb%3Daph%26jid%3DAVT%26scope%3Dsite&amp;dbKey=aph&amp;rfr_id=info%2Fsid%3Aoclc.org%2FWCL&amp;rft.order_by=preference&amp;localstem=https%3A%2F%2Fmuhlenberg.idm.oclc.org%2Flogin%3Furl%3D&amp;linktype=best" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24264528,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'LGBTQ Resources', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24264528}); ">
               The advocate
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Articles, commentary, personality profiles, reviews and book reviews representing a wide variety of gay and lesbian ideas and perspectives.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24264516">
              <a id="link_24264516" href="http://link.worldcat.org/?rft.institution_id=2547&amp;pkgName=fmdi&amp;rft.oclcnum=60639600&amp;issn=1532-1118&amp;linkclass=to_article&amp;jKey=3UB&amp;provider=hwwilson&amp;title=Gay+and+Lesbian+Review+Worldwide&amp;rft.content=fulltext&amp;linkScheme=ebscoh&amp;jHome=http%3A%2F%2Fsearch.ebscohost.com%2Fdirect.asp%3Fdb%3Dofm%26jid%3D%25223UB%2522%26scope%3Dsite&amp;dbKey=ofm&amp;rfr_id=info%2Fsid%3Aoclc.org%2FWCL&amp;rft.order_by=preference&amp;localstem=https%3A%2F%2Fmuhlenberg.idm.oclc.org%2Flogin%3Furl%3D&amp;linktype=best" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24264516,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'LGBTQ Resources', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24264516}); ">
               The Gay &amp; lesbian review worldwide
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides a forum for discussion &amp; analysis of contemporary gay, lesbian &amp; bisexual ideas &amp; literature.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24264523">
              <a id="link_24264523" href="http://muse.jhu.edu.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/journals/journal_of_lesbian_and_gay_studies/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24264523,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'LGBTQ Resources', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24264523}); ">
               GLQ : a journal of lesbian and gay studies
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Providing a much-needed forum for interdisciplinary discussion, GLQ publishes scholarship, criticism, and commentary in areas as diverse as law, science studies, religion, political science, and literary studies. Its aim is to offer queer perspectives on all issues touching on sex and sexuality.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24264539">
              <a id="link_24264539" href="http://link.worldcat.org/?rft.institution_id=2547&amp;pkgName=current&amp;rft.oclcnum=1790856&amp;issn=0091-8369&amp;linkclass=to_article&amp;jKey=wjhm20&amp;provider=informaworld&amp;title=Journal+of+Homosexuality&amp;rft.content=fulltext&amp;eissn=1540-3602&amp;linkScheme=tandf&amp;jHome=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.tandfonline.com%2Fopenurl%3Fgenre%3Djournal%26stitle%3Dwjhm20&amp;rfr_id=info%2Fsid%3Aoclc.org%2FWCL&amp;rft.order_by=preference&amp;localstem=https%3A%2F%2Fmuhlenberg.idm.oclc.org%2Flogin%3Furl%3D&amp;linktype=best" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24264539,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'LGBTQ Resources', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24264539}); ">
               Journal of homosexuality
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The  Journal of Homosexuality is an internationally acclaimed, peer-reviewed publication devoted to publishing a wide variety of disciplinary and interdisciplinary scholarship to foster a thorough understanding of the complexities, nuances, and the multifaceted aspects of sexuality and gender. The chief aim of the journal is to publish thought-provoking scholarship by researchers, community activists, and scholars who employ a range of research methodologies and who offer a variety of perspectives to continue shaping knowledge production in the arenas of lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender (LGBT) studies and queer studies.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20804143">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20804143">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20804143">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Websites
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20804143">
          <div id="boxatt20804143" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24264598">
              <a id="link_24264598" href="http://www.urban.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24264598,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'LGBTQ Resources', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24264598}); ">
               The Urban Institute
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The Urban Institute is a nonprofit policy research organization established in Washington, D.C., in 1968. It investigates the social and economic problems confronting the nation and government policies and public and private programs designed to alleviate them. UI reports include the National Survey of America's Families, a representative look at the well-being of adults and children from 13 states, including Colorado, and Assessing the New Federalism, a multi-year research project to analyze the devolution of responsibility for social programs from the federal government to the states, focusing primarily on health care, income security, job training, and social services.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5545203" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox20804175">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20804175">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20804175">
          <div class="bi_search">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Search Google Scholar for Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_20" id="content10101170">
          <div id="boxatt10101170" class="boxatt">
           <label for="searchText10101170">
            <img alt="Google Scholar Logo" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/google_scholar.jpg" />
           </label>
           <br />
           <input type="text" value="" id="searchText10101170" class="google_search_box" title="Google scholar search" />
           <br />
           <input type="button" onclick="var queryString = document.getElementById('searchText10101170').value;queryString = queryString.replace(/\\+/g, '+');var url = 'http://scholar.google.com/scholar?q=' + queryString;window.open(url,'GScholar');" value="Search" />
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
